name: Developer Roadmap Interactive
description: Complete developer roadmap system with 65+ roles across 7 specialist pathways. Interactive learning platform with hands-on projects, skills assessment, and personalized career guidance.
author: Plugin Agent Marketplace

agents.name: Frontend & Web Specialist
agents.description: Master frontend development: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Vue, Angular, Next.js, and modern web technologies. 10+ roles covered.

agents.name: Backend & Server Specialist
agents.description: Backend expertise: Node.js, Python, Java, Go, Rust, PHP, Spring Boot, Django, FastAPI. 10+ roles covered.

agents.name: Full-Stack & Frameworks Expert
agents.description: Full-stack development, framework integration, Next.js, Django, Spring, Laravel, and application architecture. 8+ roles covered.

agents.name: DevOps & Cloud Architect
agents.description: DevOps, cloud (AWS, GCP, Azure), Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, CI/CD, infrastructure management. 10+ roles covered.

agents.name: Data, AI & ML Engineer
agents.description: Data science, machine learning, AI engineering, data analytics, Big Data platforms. 10+ roles covered.

agents.name: Security & QA Expert
agents.description: Cybersecurity, ethical hacking, penetration testing, QA automation, testing frameworks, compliance. 8+ roles covered.

agents.name: Advanced Tech & Leadership
agents.description: Advanced languages (Rust, C++, Golang), Blockchain, Product Management, Engineering Leadership, UX Design. 9+ roles covered.
